feed.subtitle: Data Scientist with specialization in NLP

entry.title: Predicting Eutrophication in the Mississippi Delta

link.title: Predicting Eutrophication in the Mississippi Delta

entry.content: This is an interesting and novel approach to classifying nitrogen data into buckets. I hope you find it inspirational to try out-of-the box techniques to solving problems. Feedback is appreciated at anandologist@gmail.com.
entry.summary: This is an interesting and novel approach to classifying nitrogen data into buckets. I hope you find it inspirational to try out-of-the box techniques to solving problems. Feedback is appreciated at anandologist@gmail.com.
